titleStmt.title: A frivolous paper, in form of a petition framed & composed by a disaffected party in this city of London, intended by them to be presented to the honorable House of Commons : with certain considerations propounded by way of advertisement and caution unto those who through unadvisadnesse [sic] are apt to subscribe the same / by a Well-willer to peace and truth.
titleStmt.author: Well-willer to peace and truth.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for W. Ley and F.I.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the William Andrews Clark Memorial Library, University of California, Los Angeles.
